bindings.name: usersRawIn
bindings.sqlQuery: SELECT * FROM c WHERE (NOT IS_DEFINED(c.deleted) OR c.deleted = false)

bindings.name: userChangesIn
bindings.sqlQuery: SELECT TOP 100 * FROM c ORDER BY c.changeTimestamp DESC

bindings.name: groupsRawIn
bindings.sqlQuery: SELECT * FROM c WHERE (NOT IS_DEFINED(c.deleted) OR c.deleted = false)

bindings.name: groupChangesIn
bindings.sqlQuery: SELECT TOP 100 * FROM c ORDER BY c.changeTimestamp DESC
